if (event.target.value.length < 8) { event.target.setCustomValidity('Password must be at least 8 characters'); } else { event.target.setCustomValidity(''); }

const password = document.getElementById('password').value; if (event.target.value !== password) { event.target.setCustomValidity('Passwords do not match'); } else { event.target.setCustomValidity(''); }

const password = document.getElementById('password').value; const confirmPassword = document.getElementById('confirm_password').value; if (password && confirmPassword && password === confirmPassword) { document.getElementById('main-form').requestSubmit(); } else { alert('Please ensure all fields are filled and passwords match.'); }
